title: 如何看待 General Spalding 开始在推特上指责CCP（很可能在）引导骚乱？
contents:
现在有他 sponsor 这个“阴谋论“，我们会看到川普开口指责CCP煽颠美国的奇观吗？

https://twitter.com/robert_spalding
有很多条，包括转推，我Quote几条原创的
Fentanyl, coronavirus, riots - the patterns are there.

Riots all throughout the US - “China has again warned that it will retaliate against the United States if Washington takes action over Hong Kong this week.”

Not just antifa. CCP. Russia. And others.

The difference between 9/11 and today is that then we recognized we were under attack.

CCP and Russian bots fueling it.

Not just Russians also CCP. This is not a dem vs rep thing. Influence is coming from outside the country.

They are supported by the CCP, Russians and others. It’s not about us as a nation. It’s about those nations who want to see America destroyed.

Americans I’m begging you. Understand that there are bad actors in our social media. Recognize that to preserve our Republic we need to come together as a nation. The CCP, Russians and others are using this unforgivable act to fan the flames that are meant to weaken our bonds.


甚至直指明州警察局可能被渗透

This guy（Chauvin）had been behaving this way for awhile. Why no discipline? Who’s running the police department in Minneapolis? Who’s responsible for hiring and firing the police in Minneapolis? Seems like outside influence at play. Looks like 2016, but worse.Big data, social media, Bots?


川普发“CHINA！"的时候是不是已经听说了这种猜测，但没有证据不好乱说？
